name: The Skillful Tree
description:
In The Skillful Tree you play as a sapling trying to climb your way to the sun!

Climb - Collect sundrops and swing your way to the top!  Avoid tough and scary enemies and reach your leaves for the sun!

Evolve - As you get closer to the sun you'll acquire new sun based powers and different plants!  Climb fast and reach your final form!

Hug The Sun - Climb to the top to hug the sun and absorb it's power!
